text: Laila Sinikka Halme, née Soppi (4 March 1934 – 28 November 2021), was a Finnish singer. She took part in the 1963 Eurovision Song Contest with the song "Muistojeni laulu". She finished in tied 13th place. Halme died on 28 November 2021 in Helsinki, Finland at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Finnish singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants
title: Laila Halme
